attributes.action: support our campaign to retain Coombes Farm as green belt, agricultural land by strengthening planning legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are a small group of concerned residents who are dedicated to opposing
    proposals to build on this green belt and high grade
    agricultural land.  It is also a special protection area and
    site of special scientific interest. It is rich in wildlife and
    the footpath forms part of the Roach Valley Way, a rural route
    used by thousands of visitors and residents.  The site is also
    situated directly beneath Southend Airport's flight path
